decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with spells in order to bring back Arclight Phoenix from the graveyard. By using a combination of card draw and cheap spells, the deck aims to cast multiple spells in a turn to trigger the Phoenix's ability and quickly pressure the opponent. The inclusion of disruptive spells like Spell Pierce and Brazen Borrower helps to protect the Phoenix while maintaining pressure on the opponent. Overall, the deck is designed to be fast, aggressive, and resilient in order to overwhelm the opponent with repeated threats.

The deck focuses on leveraging the enchantment Enigmatic Incarnation to tutor for powerful threats and disrupt the opponent's game plan. By constantly sacrificing and tutoring enchantments, the deck aims to control the board and overwhelm the opponent with a variety of threats. The inclusion of the companion Yorion, Sky Nomad allows for additional value by flickering permanents. With a mix of creatures and enchantments, the deck seeks to outvalue and outmaneuver the opponent in a grindy game.

This deck focuses on utilizing the combo potential of cards like Gyruda, Doom of Depths and Spinewoods Armadillo to generate powerful synergies and overwhelm your opponent. By using cards like Spark Double and Release to the Wind, you can manipulate the board state to your advantage and set up devastating plays. With a mix of ramp, removal, and card advantage, this deck aims to consistently disrupt your opponent's strategy while building up your own resources to pull off game-winning combos.

This deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana with green devotion cards like Nykthos and Tribute to the World Tree, allowing for early drops of powerful creatures like Tyvar and Polukranos. The deck also includes cards like Collected Company and Werewolf Pack Leader for additional creature generation and pressure. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast, aggressive playstyle and high devotion to green mana symbols.

The key focus of this Dimir Control deck is to establish board control and disrupt the opponent's game plan through targeted removal, hand disruption, and card advantage. The deck aims to outvalue the opponent by generating card advantage with powerful planeswalkers like Narset, Parter of Veils and utilizing the card draw from spells like Omen of the Sea. The deck also includes a companion in Yorion, Sky Nomad for additional value and flexibility. With a mix of removal, card draw, and disruption spells, this deck aims to grind out the opponent and control the game until victory.
